title: Mechanical Ruler
summaries: The Mechanical Ruler is an accessory purchased from the Mechanic for 1 GC. While equipped, it draws a semi-transparent grid overlay on the screen, making individual block distances much clearer. This grid fades out when the player begins moving and returns once movement stops. The row and column of the block the mouse is hovering over are also highlighted in red, drawing a cross on the screen with the cursor at its center.
On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked>, this effect is caused by the <linked>Ruler</linked>.
